description:
*🦹‍♂️ Don't be a VILLAIN!*
Click Subscribe! ► https://tinyurl.com/ft-xmendisneyvillain

Boy oh boy, loyal Theorist, the Disney+ X-Men 97 show was SUCH a banger. We still can't get over how awesome it is to see Wolverine on the small screen AND on the big screen, in Deadpool & Wolverine, this summer. Now we all know the worst X-Men villains like Magneto, Apocalypse, and Sabretooth; but did you know that NONE of them hold up to the worst X-Men villain of all.... Disney!
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers:  Forrest Lee
Editors:  Alex "Sedge" Sedgwick, Warak, AbsolutePixel
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman

title: Film Theory: The X-Men Should Be VERY Afraid of Disney!
